env.PYSPARK_SUBMIT_ARGS: --master k8s://https://kubernetes:443 --conf spark.kubernetes.container.image=ksunhokim/gorani-stream:v4 --name job --conf spark.executor.instances=1 --conf spark.kubernetes.authenticate.driver.serviceAccountName=spar --conf spark.cassandra.connection.host=cassandra --conf spark.kubernetes.pyspark.pythonVersion=3 --conf spark.kubernetes.driverEnv.GORANI_KAFKA_BROKERS=kafka:9092 --jars local:///etc/spark-cassandra-connector_2.11-2.3.2.jar,local:///etc/spark-sql-kafka-0-10_2.11-2.4.0.jar,local:///etc/kafka-clients-0.10.1.0.jar,local:///etc/jsr166e-1.1.0.jar --executor-memory 1G --total-executor-cores 1 pyspark-shell
